modShortDescription: Added new tier of 6 elites zombies with more health and more regeneration.
modDescription:
Added new tier of 6 elites [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) with more health and more regeneration.

* Spawn in POI in groups “badassOnlyHorde” and “badassHorde” (start GS 80 with very little prob. More prob GS 200+).
* Spawn with screamer and bloodmoon (start GS 140\. See entitygroups.xml for more details)
* Changes Loot TimeStayAfterDeath 1800 sec
* LootDropProb 0.5 (one chance out of two)
* LootDropEntityClass Boss (better loot)
* Elites run all the time. Independent of FeralMove

## Changelog

Updated for A20 by Ratbertt.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sfNhR5G-lUbtUs11eoWXTZRI1ZtC4ag7/view?usp=sharing)** for A20
